function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Study limitations on small to medium-sized medical equipment for COVID-19","Impact":"Potential lack of comprehensive understanding of medical equipment needs for COVID-19","Mitigation":"Include a broader range of medical equipment in future studies, and conduct quantitative analysis","Technologies":"Medical equipment and technology for COVID-19 diagnosis and treatment","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, and researchers","Owner":"Researchers and healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Qualitative comparison of technologies","Impact":"Limited depth of understanding of technology effectiveness for COVID-19","Mitigation":"Conduct quantitative analysis and comprehensive review of technologies","Technologies":"COVID-19 support technologies","People":"Healthcare workers and patients","Owner":"Research institutions and healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Limitation of search strategy to two databases: Google and ScienceDirect","Impact":"Potential insufficient coverage of relevant literature and research","Mitigation":"Expand search to include additional databases and sources, and conduct a more comprehensive literature review","Technologies":"COVID-19 research and support technologies","People":"Researchers and healthcare professionals","Owner":"Research institutions and academic organizations"}]}
